description: This file defines a data class 'Note' representing a note entity with properties id, title, and body. It includes a companion object with a method to create new instances with a unique id.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: A data class representing a note with id, title, and body, along with a companion object for creating new notes.

methods.name: Note.Companion.new
methods.description: Creates a new Note instance with a unique UUID id, empty title and body.
